title: Capitalize month letters in date display

requirements.text: Update the date formatting function in frontend/src/lib/pstDate.ts to return month names in all uppercase letters (e.g., 'JANUARY', 'FEBRUARY', 'MARCH') instead of the current format

quotes: capital all the letters of the "month" in date

acceptanceCriteria: All date displays throughout the app show month names in uppercase (e.g., 'JANUARY 15, 2025' instead of 'January 15, 2025')
The change applies consistently across all screens: Dashboard, History, Log, and Analytics
Date formatting functions in pstDate.ts return uppercased month names

constraints: Do not modify the PST timezone logic or date calculation logic
Do not change the date format structure, only the capitalization of month names
nonGoals: Changing date format beyond month capitalization
Modifying other text capitalization in the UI
Adding user preferences for date formatting
